revision.text: ==Finnish== ===Etymology=== The multiplicative case of {{m|fi|yksi||one}}; {{suffix|fi|yksi|sti}} ===Pronunciation=== {{fi-pronunciation|*}} ===Adverb=== {{fi-adv|comp=-}} # [[once]] #: ''Olen tavannut h√§net '''yhdesti'''.'' #:: ''I have met him '''once'''.'' ====Usage notes==== Although grammatically fully correct, ''yhdesti'' is, both in standard Finnish and in spoken Finnish, practically always replaced by saying ''(yhden) kerran'' – ''yhdesti'' is, however, quite normally used in mathematics. ===Anagrams=== * {{anagrams|fi|a=dehisty|yhdiste}}
